duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop conceptual design for all project phases
Establish design direction and coordinate construction document preparation
Present and provide day-to-day client support
Conduct design-related research and develop industry network
Mentor team members with less experience and engage in internal and external project leadership
Lead team 3D renderings and generate redlines in documentation set

education_certification.credential: BS or BA degree in Architecture or equivalent (or knowledge gained over years of work experience)
Licensed Architect with current registration preferred or working towards registration
